docs.lead_paragraph: EACH year as Summer comes around there is important news that never reaches the headlines. It has to do with little peas, half formed in the pod; with lettuces waving their leaves above the soil, with lima beans, asparagus and cauliflower, all ripening on farms for the tables of New York.

headline.main: NOW THE DEW IS ON OUR VEGETABLES; The Near-By Gardens Send Us Food That Has An Unwonted Freshness and Succulence
